messages.translation: Hello again! This bot will help you keep up-to-date with everything happening on FreeFeed. It will send you FreeFeed notifications and you can reply to them directly in Telegram. To give the bot access to your notifications, you need to create a special access token. Please create it using the button below and send it to the bot:

messages.id: :e-mail: {CreatedUser} replyed to you in a comment to the post "{Digest}":
messages.message: :e-mail: {CreatedUser} replyed to you in a comment to the post "{Digest}":
